data.title: Soda Green Announces 20th Anniversary Tour and Return to Original Name
data.meta_description: Sodagreen Announces 20th Anniversary Tour Taiwanese band Sodagreen, also known as “Yu Ding Shi,” has officially announced their upcoming “Twenty Year Moment” concert tour under their original name, Sodagreen. The tour is set to kick off in March next year in Hong Kong, marking the band’s 20th anniversary in the music industry. The decision to […]
data.text:
Sodagreen Announces 20th Anniversary Tour

Taiwanese band Sodagreen, also known as “Yu Ding Shi,” has officially announced their upcoming “Twenty Year Moment” concert tour under their original name, Sodagreen. The tour is set to kick off in March next year in Hong Kong, marking the band’s 20th anniversary in the music industry.

The decision to revert to their original name comes after temporary changes due to contractual and other issues. Sodagreen, which had previously performed under the name “Yu Ding Shi,” has now reclaimed their original identity as they prepare to celebrate two decades of music and entertainment.

The band, consisting of six members, expressed their excitement for the upcoming tour, noting that their previous tour was in 2015 and acknowledging that this may be their last large-scale journey together. Despite this, they remain dedicated to delivering an unforgettable experience for their fans.

As part of their preparations, Sodagreen plans to replicate their 10th anniversary tour in 2014, with a focus on showcasing the talent and creativity of all six members. The tour will feature a selection of songs from the band’s extensive discography, providing a nostalgic and captivating performance for their dedicated fanbase.

Additionally, the band has recently reacquired the name “Sodagreen,” following a lengthy registration process. While maintaining their original identity, the band reassures fans that the name “Yu Ding Shi” will also make a return in due time.

Amidst their tour preparations, Sodagreen also unveiled a new official concert social platform and released a trailer for the “Twenty Years A Moment” tour. They have also updated several reissue albums on various digital platforms, hinting at a fresh and innovative approach for their 20th anniversary celebrations.

The band’s dedication to their craft and their continued creativity have solidified their position in the music industry, with their upcoming tour serving as a testament to their enduring legacy.

With their 20th anniversary tour on the horizon, Sodagreen remains committed to delivering a memorable and impactful experience for their fans, showcasing their passion for music and performance.

Editor in charge: Xin Youan

Soda’s Green Army 20th anniversary tour kicked off in Hong Kong. (Provided by Soda Green Co., Ltd.)

[The Epoch Times, Rhagfyr 12, 2023](Epoch Times reporter Ma Weifen reported) The Taiwanese band Soda Green, which is approaching its 20th anniversary, had previously temporarily changed its name to “Yu Ding Shi” for activities due to a contract and other issues, and he has now taken it back. The group with its original name announced today (12th) that it will launch a “Twenty Year Moment” concert tour in March next year under the name Soda Green, and will recreate the 10th anniversary” Tour Audiovisual and Illusion in the Air”.

Soda Green is approaching its 20th anniversary. On December 12, it was announced that the “Twenty Year Moment” concert tour will be launched under the name Soda Green. (Provided by Soda Green Co., Ltd.)

Sodagreen’s 20th anniversary tour also chose Hong Kong as its first stop. Qingfeng said with a smile: “We love to recreate, and we won’t even let it go on tour.” This afternoon, the band members gathered together to say goodbye. to the past at the end of the year The brand new handwriting “Soda Green” announces the full launch of Soda Green.

In March next year, Sodagreen’s 20th anniversary tour will be a replica of the 10th anniversary tour in 2014. It will also start from the Hong Kong Coliseum. This will be the first time to perform at the Coliseum with four legs; they have performed at the Taipei Arena Coliseum this year and last year. To hold the “Chitang Shadow Night” concert, this 20th anniversary tour, Soda Green decided to put a Taipei stop in the finale.

Sodagreen’s last tour was in 2015. As they grow older, the six members now practice as a group, and they all feel that they once practiced less. Due to various considerations such as physical strength, Qingfeng also said bluntly, “I’m worried that this might be the last large-scale journey!”

As the group has been re-recording the album, they have become more intuitive when choosing songs this time, and the focus of the performance will be on the six people. Qingfeng said with a smile, “Being able to sing for 20 years is a stunt in itself.”

The process of getting the name “Soda Green” back is very long. The registration was only recently successful and “Soda Green” finally belongs to 6 people. However, “Yu Ding Shi” will not disappear. He will reappear in due time, just like ordinary people. Small account (clone account).

Recently, the outside world has been very concerned about Jia Kai being unfollowed by Qingfeng on social media. Qingfeng said funny that he didn’t like to see naked pictures, and then domineeringly added Jia Kai’s IG following in the spot and spot. The six people have always maintained a good relationship along the way, and have managed to maintain a good sense of distance between each other.

Deg Blynedd a Cwarter has finally reached 20 years. The band members were sharing their recent intense preparations for the tour. The revival plan will also include “Ten Blynedd a Cwarter” and “Beth Yjud Chi’n Poeni Amdano” 6 always very creative and delighted with his fans. People are the first to bring the latest short version of the song “A Moment of Ten Years” which will be released on- line tomorrow; the digital single and the MV will be released on the same day this Friday.

The trailer for Sodagreen’s 20th tour “Twenty Years A Moment” has also been launched on the newly established official concert social platform; and the four previously released “fish version” reissue albums have been updated on various digital platforms at the same time. . , meet you with the “soda green version” appearance.

Editor in charge: Xin Youan
